definitions.definition: A confection of caramelized sugar and nuts .
examples: As a child, my favorite candy was peanut brittle .

definitions.definition: Anything resembling this confection, such as flapjack , a cereal bar , etc.

main_definition: A confection of caramelized sugar and nuts .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) Anything resembling this confection, such as flapjack , a cereal bar , etc.
